channel.title: Run server fail
channel.description: kk, let me get straight to the point... i click run server.bat, this happens: [code] Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: org/apache/mina/commo n/IoAcceptor Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: org.apache.mina.common.IoAcceptor at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: server.Server. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . . [/code]

item.title: Run server fail
item.dc:creator: @Mental_Piracy Mental Piracy
item.description:
@Mental_Piracy wrote:

Either you do not have an IoAccepter.java file in org/apache/mina/commo
n/ or you never compiled it

Read full topic

item.title: Run server fail
item.dc:creator: @Tech_Python Tech Python
item.description:
@Tech_Python wrote:

erm, nope i don’t think i did :\ could it be that it’s not compatable with my os?

Read full topic

item.title: Run server fail
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

It’s saying it cant find the server file, thats often where the simple settings like timers and such are stored in PI servers. The are in simple text files, not java. Did you recently delete any files you thought were not necessary?

Read full topic
